name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing AI systems and deploying large language models (LLMs) into production. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, and building robust APIs, ensuring seamless integration and functionality of AI-driven solutions. I have significant experience in managing large data pipelines and working with distributed systems, which enhance the performance of AI applications.

In addition to my AI and engineering skills, I have a strong background in image processing and Optical Character Recognition (OCR), utilizing tools and frameworks to streamline data handling. I am also adept in leveraging **AWS** for scalable deployment and orchestration frameworks that manage complex workflows efficiently.

With a solid foundation in microservices architecture, I have successfully led the creation of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for intelligent automation and real-time data processing. My comprehensive understanding of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS ensures that the applications I develop are secure and reliable. Additionally, I bring hands-on experience with **vector databases** and **embeddings** strategies, enhancing the efficiency of machine learning workflows.
